attributes.action: Call for a no confidence debate in the event that EU trade negotiations fail
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the British Electorate were hoodwinked by Brexit campaigners in many areas but most significantly into the belief that a trade deal with the EU was a foregone conclusion. Politicians in Britain must be taught that falsehoods and rash promises will be punished and remembered by the nation.
attributes.background: I want the Government to understand that they will be held to account by Parliament for any failure in EU trade negotiations. Such a failure would be in direct contradiction of promises made by the PM to the electorate during the Brexit campaign and the general election.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence in the UK Government.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
